Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: Although you want be hooked on 1st look, give this little gem a chance! A great Italian place with authentic cuisine right in the heart of Amsterdam. Good quality of food, friendly service & great prices. You want regret it!

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: Nice staff , kind and attentive to every need there . Welcoming piace with attentin to the small detalis ! Delicious antipasti and pizza ! Also taste the delicious tiramisù

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: I'm an Italian guy and here I feel at home . Pizza number one in the heart of Amsterdam. Amazing!!

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: I've had a very lovely dinner here. Amazing italian atmosphere with great service! The pasta's and pizza's are great will return when possible.

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: Great little trattoria with a truely welcoming host from Puglia, awesome daily specials and  all-time classics on the menu, as well as some good Italian wines.

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text:
It was awesome! We had to wait a little longer due to shortage of kitchen staff, but it was absolutely worth it! We ordered fish and it was possibly the best swordfish with lemon sauce I have ever ate.
We will certainly go back and try their pizza!

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: Wonderful restaurant in  Amsterdam really a must ate there for three evenings' Run by an Italien family. Very friendly an welcoming. Enjoyed the house wine as well. A defenite must when I visit Amsterdam again.

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: Really enjoyed our starter of mushrooms and the mixed salad was fine. The vegetarian ravioli was excellent as was the tiramisu. The only downside of the meal was the obligation to buy bottled water. Amsterdam tap water is excellent and removes the need for transporting water across the planet.

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: Best Italian in the city! Very close quarters inside seating but this is Europe, make friends with your neighboring table mates! Gnocchi with shrimp was to die for.. come prepared to wait a bit then slowly savor their delicious selections.

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: Great place to eat affordable Italian food made by an italian family. Only downside is that you can only pay in cash. All in all, great place to go with family and friends just make sure to get in early or else you won't have any space.

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: Excellent, simple little restaurant, great value serving authentic Italian food, mostly pastas and pizzas, beautifully prepared and bursting with flavour. Very popular so a good idea to book ahead.

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text:
Quiet and calmed place to go with somebody and enjoy a real italian meal.
With no tourists around us, we can enjoy a very good italian meal made with good quality products. …

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: I love this restaurant! I really few home there! The food is amazing! When Mario plays guitar is even more special!

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: Good italian fresh food. Close to the tourist streets but not crowded. Enough large offers in plates. Nice service. Pizza from 8.50€ to 12.50€

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: Decent food. A little pricey and the staff takes a while to take your order and serve you. Definitely go for the pastas over the pizza.

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: The ravioli made my the Grandmother is extraordinary, go try it.

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: Authentic food and people! It's like you're in Italy but with Dutch prices

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: yum!!!! delicious pizzas and pastas for very affordable price! staff is not too friendly, and the place is too crowded always, but well, the food is worth it

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: Very salty, wine wasn't a nice match. Didn't really enjoy it, there are much better restaurants in Amsterdam that a lot cheaper and offer much better quality.

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: Great family run Italian restaurant. Friendly efficient service with a Smile. A great place for locals and tourists alike. Check it out!

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: Perfect family run restaurant with amazing food. Had Spaghetti alle Vongole and the home made ravioli - it was awesome, going back tonight

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: Very good Italian restaurant to have a quick bite. Although not to cheap, the food is very good and it is run by Italians.

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: Amazing & authentic Italian food, very friendly owners and staff, and a gem in Amsterdam!

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: competent Italian style pizza. The location is a bit charmless, but the food is good.

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: Cosy family restaurant with delicious food. Always crowded. Reservations not possible which I find charming

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: Emailed to book a table on a Tuesday night. Received a reply saying “OK” only to arrive to find it closed on Mondays and Tuesdays. Not impressed.

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: Very good affordable Italian. Always busy so tables are very close. Try mid week when not so busy.

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: Food was great, we really enjoyed it. Service was alright but slow at times, acceptable considering how busy it was.

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: Amazing family Italian - don’t miss the pizza and homemade tiramisu.

Name: Lo Stivale d'Oro
Review Text: Best ravioli ever!
